name: Thief: Deadly Shadows

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Thief - Deadly Shadows/System/t3.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
gogid: thief_3
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing d3d9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
